Information

The Venue is Bristol’s home for live music, club culture, and unforgettable nights out. Set inside a historic building in the heart of the city, it carries decades of character and stories within its walls. Fifteen years ago, the space underwent a full refurbishment — carefully restoring its original charm while transforming it into a modern, high‑quality performance environment.

The Venue hosts a diverse programme of live acts, from emerging local talent to established touring artists, alongside late‑night club events that celebrate Bristol’s rich musical identity. Whether you’re here for an intimate gig, a high‑energy DJ set, or simply to experience the atmosphere of a landmark space, The Venue continues to be a cornerstone of the city’s creative community.

If you want to find out more about our venue specifications, visit our Venue Hire page.
